current.short_description:
• Medium Firmness
  • Hand Tufted
  • Turnable
  • Choice Of Colours
  • Storage Options
  • Add Headboard
current.description:
The Cavali divan bed is a smart, modern divan with both a comfortable mattress and an attractive looking base. The mattress of this bed is a traditional sprung mattress finished in a quilted damask fabric. The mattress is hand tufted, making the fillings densely packed and adding extra durability to your mattress.

The base of the Cavali divan is available in a choice of modern chenille fabrics, giving you great flexibility if you need the bed to fit into a particular colour scheme. You can also add storage options to the base if you could benefit from the extra space in keeping your bedroom neat and tidy.
current.specs:
Mattress

Size Width Length Depth
Single 3'0" (90 cm) 6'3" (190 cm) 9" (23 cm)
Small Double 4'0" (120 cm) 6'3" (190 cm) 9" (23 cm)
Double 4'6" (135 cm) 6'3" (190 cm) 9" (23 cm)
King 5'0" (150 cm) 6'6" (200 cm) 9" (23 cm)
Super King 6'0" (180 cm) 6'6" (200 cm) 9" (23 cm)

Divan Base
current.meta_description: The Amazing Cavali divan bed has a deep hand tufted turnable mattress, full of luxury and support. Available in a rainbow of colours, this bed also has the option to add storage drawers if you need extra storage space.
current.name: Cavali Divan Bed

upsell.description:
The Corinthian orthopaedic mattress is perfect for people who prefer or indeed need a firmer sleeping surface. The mattress contains a 12.5 gauge orthopaedic spring unit and chosen fillings that relieve pressure and aid spinal support throughout the night.

The mattress is traditionally hand tufted here in our factory to provide a stable surface and keep all of the mattress fillings compact and extra secure.
upsell.specs:
Size Width Length Mattress Depth
Single 3'0" (90 cm) 6'3" (190 cm) 9" (22 cm)
Small Double 4'0" (120 cm)
Double 4'6" (135 cm)
King 5'0" (150 cm) 6'6" (200 cm)
Super King 6'0" (180 cm)
upsell.meta_description: The Corinthian Mattress provides excellent orthopaedic support. Hand tufted and traditionally filled we manufacture and deliver in only 3 days to your door.
upsell.name: Corinthian Orthopedic Mattress

upsell.short_description:
• Great Value
  • Medium Firm
  • Durable Cotton
  • Contract Grade
  • Crib Source 5
  • Hand Tufted
upsell.description:
The Dallas Mattress is a medium firmness 13.5 open coil hand tufted model with layers of filling to provide a comfortable supportive sleeping surface. The mattress is covered with a striped 100% Black and White* Cotton fabric that is both comfortable and hard wearing.

This is a Contract Quality Hotel Mattress and Conforms to BS 7177 Medium Hazard (Crib 5) Fire Regulations. This added feature ensures all fabric and fillings have fire resistant properties, with this higher flame retardancy the mattress conforms above the standard levels required for residential use and is an excellent safety feature.

The Dallas is all round a great mattress for residential and hotels alike, the medium mattress offers a good balance that most people would enjoy a good night's sleep on.

For further enquiries or bulk orders speak to our contracts team on 0800 917 6518

*Pattern on the mattress cover may vary from picture, however, will be the equivalent standard or higher.
upsell.meta_description: The Dallas mattress is a hotel quality open coil mattress treated to CRIB Source 5 regulations suited to multiple occupancy homes or for Airbnb lets. Dallas has a medium firm comfort. Manufactured and supplied through Bed Factory Direct.
upsell.name: Dallas Mattress

upsell.short_description:
• Soft Comfort Grade
  • Quality Fillings
  • Brass Vents
  • Turning Handles
  • Supportive Motion Pocket Springs
upsell.description:
The Finesse is a luxurious mattress featuring a 1500 count pocket sprung unit and a raft of top grade fillings including responsive and supportive reflex foam, natural latex, wool, cashmere and soft white cotton felt. It boasts a hand stitched border and hand tufted finish which matches its aesthetic appeal to its fantastic build quality.

Manufactured under strict quality controlled conditions the Finesse mattress will have you feeling rejuvenated and well rested after a peaceful night's sleep. With 1500 pocket springs partner movements will not ripple across the full area of the mattress and each sleeper will receive support based on their own body weight and not of the overall weight applied to the mattress.
upsell.meta_description: The Finesse is a pocket sprung mattress with natural fillings of cashmere, wool, white cotton and latex. Highlights of the British craftsmanship is the hand stitching and hand tufting providing a soft feel. Delivered to your room of choice free of charge.
upsell.name: Finesse Pocket Sprung Mattress

upsell.short_description:
• Medium Firm
  • 6000 Pocket Springs
  • 11" Deep
  • Dual Spring Set
  • Hand Tufted
  • Egyptian Cotton
  • Natural Materials - Cotton, Hemp & Wool
upsell.description:
The Natural 6000 Pocket mattress is made with organic materials and end of life recycling in mind. The 6000 pocket springs are a dual spring mechanism of the ultra-supportive Revolution and Airtanium HD technology providing exceptional support to weary bodies by first yielding and then fine-tuning to the contours of your body.

The mattress has a comfort layer of finest cotton and wool, excellent for the elimination of moisture, fungus, bacteria and dust mites. Filled with hemp and wool these natural materials allow the mattress to breathe. Covered with a fine Egyptian Cotton is soft to the touch. Providing durability, strength, comfort, moisture and temperature control. Egyptian cotton wicks moisture away and through evaporation reduces body temperature. This all adds up to a more hygienic sleeping environment and comfortable night's sleep for you.

The Natural 6000 Pocket offers a medium/firm tension and is available as a single, double or king or superking size.
upsell.meta_description: The Naturals 6000 Collection Egyptian Cotton Mattress incorporates natural organic fillings cotton, hemp and wool, a hi-tech 6000 spring set. Providing comfort, support and an excellent night's sleep. Made by Bed Factory Direct with free delivery.
upsell.name: Natural 6000 Pocket Egyptian Cotton Mattress
